metadata.title: CVE-2019-17019 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: When Python was installed on Windows, a python file being served with theMIME type of text/plain could be executed by Python instead of being openedas a text file when the Open option was selected upon download. *Note: thisissue only occurs on Windows. Other operating systems are unaffected.*.This vulnerability affects Firefox < 72.

criterions.comment: mozjs38: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
mozjs52 package in esm-infra/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
